Bowling

A factor in the prevalence of bowling in absolutely the entire society is the simplicity of this game. It would seem that everything, without exception, is very clear: throw the ball and knock down the skittles - and you are the champion! However, it is necessary to take into account a large number of conditions factors from the gravity of the ball itself up to the force and direction of impact. Almost everything also depends on luck, because even the most seasoned professional will not be able to completely predict the trajectory of the cherished core. That is why broadcasts of bowling championships gather such a huge audience. Serious passions boil here! And the same excitement is available to every visitor of our bowling club.
Feel like a bowling alley star and set an achievement! In order to find the right role, we recommend that you read our tips. Here you will find the best offers in order to make the right choice and spend a memorable evening on the track.
Bowling is not bad because it suits absolutely everyone without exception. You don't have to be an athlete or a fan to test yourself. No special skills or conditions required. Club representatives will be happy to provide guests with everything they need and even more: they will offer snacks and desserts, the opportunity to sit in a cozy area for communication, discuss a game or current affairs.
The throwing technique can be easily mastered, and although the first ball is likely to go wide in general, already in the first training session you will be able to put the shot and achieve the first results. In a place where you can play bowling, you can gather with your family, work colleagues. Or bring a big company to arrange a real tournament with impressive prizes!

Children's holiday for adults

We give the children the whole club for fun, do not let them get bored and take care of safety
Worried that all your friends won't fit in the children's party? In vain! There are enough places in our big bowling club for everyone. In the daytime, the complex is at the complete disposal of young visitors. But they are never left without adult supervision, although they themselves do not notice this, absorbed by animation programs. They are especially delighted with the soap bubble show and chemical experiments, which last for two hours.
Parents do not spare anything for the upbringing and entertainment of children, but why overwork when we have tempting offers for a holiday for any reason. On birthdays, for example, we provide unique and interesting events. Choose shows and master classes. While you're bowling, you can also browse our range of delicious snacks, including a patisserie.
